GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article specified by ID

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments that are related to an article by user specified article id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment for a given article if the article exists and the user is registered

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of an article specified by article_id and responds with the updated article.

exampleResponse.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!
